2090250.name: RPG Maker MV - RPG Character Pack 7
2090250.description:
One of the cool things about an RPG is that you can often play and meet characters that are very different from what you know in real life. Here, demons, different kinds of elves and even demigods can be encountered and interacted with which opens up many interesting gameplay and narrative possibilities. Those and more new humanoid yet not fully human characters wait for you to tell their story in RPG Character Pack 7!

As always, the RPG Character Pack comes with large artwork, Charsets, SV Battlers, Battlers and Busts and Faces with emotions, so you can use the characters for any role in your story.

Your game is the stage, and these amazing demihumans will play whatever part you assign them to!

Features:

* 16 new RPG-style characters
* Includes battlers, SV battlers, portraits, facesets with various emotions

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
2090250.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 日语, 韩语, 繁体中文, 阿拉伯语, 简体中文
